mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboard(bno, title, writer, content) VALUES(freeboard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, fbl.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM freeboard
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or writer LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC ) fbl )
WHERE rn >= #{start} AND rn < #{end}
